data.title: Barnstable Performing Arts Center
data.meta_description: The Cape Symphony usually performs in Cape Cod’s premier concert hall, Barnstable Performing Arts Center, located at 744 West Main Street, Hyannis MA 02601.
data.text:
What is the Barnstable Performing Arts Center?

Cape Cod’s 1400-seat premier concert hall, where the Cape Symphony usually performs. It's located inside Barnstable High School at 744 West Main Street, Hyannis MA 02601. Every seat in the hall has a great view!

How do I get there?

Take Route 6 on Cape Cod to exit 68, then Route 132 towards Hyannis. Take a right at the third set of traffic lights onto Phinney’s Lane. Proceed 1.5 miles to a traffic light. Take a sharp left onto Route 28. Bear right at the fork onto West Main Street. The Barnstable High School campus will be on your left. The Performing Arts Center entrances are located to the far right of the building complex as you face it from West Main Street. View a map.

Where can I park?

Ample free parking is available on three sides of the Barnstable Performing Arts Center. See diagram.

Is there space for wheelchairs?

The Barnstable Performing Arts Center has 10 designated wheelchair spaces in sections B, C, and E. You may purchase a wheelchair space and adjacent seats for companion(s). Please inform the Box Office of your needs when ordering your tickets by phone or in person, or look for the wheelchair symbol when ordering online. If your seats are in the Loge (second floor), there is an elevator at the far end of the lobby. For safety reasons, your companion must be able to assist you with the wheelchair and bringing you into the concert hall. Learn more about accessibility.

Is there a place to check a coat?

Yes, free coat check service is provided at every performance. The coat check table is at the far end of the lobby.

Where is the Lost & Found for items left in the concert hall?

Please report all lost items or give any found items to the Box Office or an usher at the Barnstable Performing Arts Center. If your lost item has not been found before you leave the Center, contact the Cape Symphony Box Office at 2235 Iyannough Road in West Barnstable, MA (508.362.1111) on the following Tuesday. All "found" items are held there.

Please be aware that smoking is prohibited in all areas of the Barnstable Performing Arts Center, Barnstable High School, and its grounds.
